name: duden-spell-grammar-check
description: Extension to check for spelling and grammar mistakes (german language)

commands.title: Toggle automatic Duden spelling check around cursor.

colors.description: Background decoration color for spelling and grammar errors

duden-spell-grammar-check.autoCheckSurro.title: Automatically Check #-Characters Before
duden-spell-grammar-check.autoCheckSurro.description: Describes the number of characters to be checked before the cursor-position. The characters of before and after are not to exceed 800 with the free version.

duden-spell-grammar-check.autoCheckSurro.title: Automatically Check #-Characters After
duden-spell-grammar-check.autoCheckSurro.description: Describes the number of characters to be checked after the cursor-position. The characters of before and after are not to exceed 800 with the free version.

duden-spell-grammar-check.autoCheckSurro.title: Automatically Check Interval
duden-spell-grammar-check.autoCheckSurro.description: Automatically check every #-milliseconds when active. Should be at least one second

duden-spell-grammar-check.autoCheckSurro.title: Sentence Delimiter
duden-spell-grammar-check.autoCheckSurro.description: In order to automatically check surrounding text without producing wrong answers at the start and end of the selection, the set of delimiters will be used to determine starting and ending positions of a sentence. The algorithm will check all delimiters and choose the widest selection possible.
